name: Blobi Sprint
description:
HOW FAST CAN YOU GO ?

Challenge your friends in an endless run!
Up to 4 players with a single keyboard or 4 controllers.

THE GOAL IS SIMPLE

Tap the only button as fast as you can to move and stay on screen. If you get off screen, you will lose. The last Blobi standing wins the Game.



Features :
  • 2-4 Players
  • 1 Button
  • 1 Level
  • 1 Goal
  • 1 Winner!

WARNING : Fast tapping for survival can be very exhausting!
